TestCase.name: testFetch0WithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable FETCH FIRST 0 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a, c])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithLimitSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM LimitTable FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable, source: [limit: 10]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(offset=[10], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[10], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[20], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithOffsetAndLimitSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM LimitTable OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(offset=[10], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[10], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[20], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable, source: [limit: 20]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLimit0WithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable LIMIT 0 OFFSET 10
LogicalSort(offset=[10], fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a, c])

TestCase.name: testLimit0WithOffset0
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable LIMIT 0 OFFSET 0
LogicalSort(offset=[0], fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a, c])

TestCase.name: testLimit0WithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable LIMIT 0
LogicalSort(fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLimitWithLimitSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM LimitTable LIMIT 10
LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable, source: [limit: 10]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testOrderByWithLimitSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM LimitTable ORDER BY c LIMIT 10
LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[c ASC], offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[c ASC], offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLimitWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable LIMIT 10 OFFSET 1
LogicalSort(offset=[1], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[1], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[11], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLimitWithOffset0
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0
LogicalSort(offset=[0], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLimitWithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable LIMIT 5
LogicalSort(fetch=[5]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[5], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[5], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testOnlyOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable OFFSET 10 ROWS
LogicalSort(offset=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[10], fetch=[unlimited], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLimitWithOffsetAndLimitSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM LimitTable LIMIT 10 OFFSET 1
LogicalSort(offset=[1], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Limit(offset=[1], fetch=[10], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[11], global=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LimitTable, source: [limit: 11]]], fields=[a, b, c])
